intro: Argyroderma × kleijnhansii, commonly known as the Kleijnhansii silverleaf. It is a hybrid plant belonging to the family Aizoaceae, characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and small, star-shaped flowers. The plant is native to South Africa and thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. Its leaves are typically covered in a silvery or white waxy coating, which helps reduce water loss. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
